attributes.action: Stop a televised debate as advertised by Sky entitled "Make Debates Happen".
attributes.additional_details: There already are opportunities for the public to watch live debates on TV virtually every day.
attributes.background:
Sky TV are bombarding the public with their claimed need for a public debate.
After a boring campaign of advertising they are very slowly gathering numbers.
The purpose of this petition is to advise that many more people are against the idea.
